briefTitle: TAASS-Traumeel Ointment and Gel Compared With a Topical NSAID in Athletes With Acute Ankle Sprain
officialTitle: A Randomized, Controlled, Multi-center Study on the Effectiveness of Traumeel S (Both Ointment and Gel) in Terms of Pain and Function Compared With a Topical NSAID in Athletes With Acute Ankle Sprain

interventions.name: Traumeel S ointment
otherNames: Traumeel S ointment, Traumeel S gel, Diclofenac gel

summary: The objective of this study is to determine the efficacy of Traumeel S (both ointment and gel) compared to another antiinflammatory drug called Diclofenac in patients with a sprained ankle.

primaryOutcome.measure: Patient's Assessment of Ankle Pain (VAS)- Absolute Value Decrease on Day 7
